## Overview

`{stockfish}` is an R package that collect information about the Pokemon's World through [PokeApi][https://github.com/PokeAPI/pokeapi] and [Serebii][https://www.serebii.net/].

## Installation


Install the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/EmanuelHark12/pkmnR):

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("EmanuelHark12/pkmnR")
```

## Example

With`{pkmnR}`, you can search information about a certain pokemon, like 
Pikachu with a function `{poke_info}`

```{r}
library(pkmnR)
library(kableExtra)
library(magrittr)
pikachu <- poke_info('pikachu')
pikachu %>% 
  kbl(caption = 'Information about Pikachu') %>% 
  kable_paper("hover", full_width = F)
```
